500 x  1 = 500
500 x  2 = 1000
500 x  3 = 1500
500 x  4 = 2000
500 x  5 = 2500
500 x  6 = 3000
500 x  7 = 3500
500 x  8 = 4000
500 x  9 = 4500
500 x  10 = 5000
500 x  11 = 5500
500 x  12 = 6000
500 x  13 = 6500
500 x  14 = 7000
500 x  15 = 7500
500 x  16 = 8000
500 x  17 = 8500
500 x  18 = 9000
500 x  19 = 9500
500 x  20 = 10000
